title: Beautiful 3 Bedroom
posting_body: ["This lovely, newly renovated 3 Bedroom Apartment *SPANKING' NEW Renovations *Shining wood floors!", '*', '3 mid sized rooms all with excellent natural light w/ full closets in each room *', 'Top design kitchen w/ Plenty of storage space * s/s appliances including Microwave dishwasher *', 'Sparkling bath facilities * Kitchen / living area combo * Video intercom w/ front door buzzer', 'Central A/C', 'High Ceilings', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Video Intercom', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Dishwasher', 'Granite countertops', 'Built in microwave', 'Natural Light in Living Area', 'Text Leo at 212-470-8830 to schedule a viewing!', 'Thanks!', 'If you want to inquire about the apartment, send me a text with the following:', 'Name', 'Move in date', 'Income', 'Credit', 'Link to this apartment', 'I work for Nooklyn and can show you any apartment on their site.', 'No need to look for another agent =) Feel free to send me a text with:', 'Move in date:', 'Budget:', 'Bedrooms:', 'Amenities:', 'Areas:', 'Looking forward to hearing from you!', 'Thank you =)']
